original_title: Bodies of two schoolchildren washed ashore in Kokkuvil
original_body_lines: The bodies of two schoolchildren were washed ashore on the Kokkuvil beach in the Kokuvil police division this afternoon.
Police said the bodies were identified as those of two 16-year-old schoolchildren of Iruthayapuram and Karuwappankeni.
Initial investigations revealed that the two children had drowned while they were bathing in the sea along the Kokkuvil beach last evening.
